sqls.sql: SELECT UNIQUE_CODE FROM SYS_USER where OPENID = :OPENID
select UNIQUE_CODE as UNIQUE_CODE$K$H, SUMMARY 订单, TOTAL_AMT 金额, STATUS 状态, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 from ES_ORDER where USER_UC = :USER_UC order by CREATE_TIME desc
select p.name as 产品名称, oi.PRODUCT_COUNT as 数量, oi.TOTAL_AMT as 金额 from ES_ORDER_ITEM oi left join ES_PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_UC = p.UNIQUE_CODE where oi.ORDER_UC = :ORDER_UC
SELECT UNIQUE_CODE as UNIQUE_CODE$K$H, NAME as 名称,PRICE as 单价, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 FROM ES_PRODUCT
SELECT p.*, f.PATH THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM ES_PRODUCT p left join SYS_FILE_STORE_MAPPING f on p.THUMBNAIL = f.UNIQUE_CODE where p.UNIQUE_CODE = :UNIQUE_CODE
SELECT count(1) FROM ES_SHOPPING_CART where USER_UC = :USER_UC
SELECT PRODUCT_COUNT FROM ES_SHOPPING_CART where USER_UC = :USER_UC and PRODUCT_UC = :PRODUCT_UC
MERGE INTO ES_SHOPPING_CART(UNIQUE_CODE, USER_UC, PRODUCT_UC, PRODUCT_COUNT) KEY(USER_UC, PRODUCT_UC) values(:UNIQUE_CODE, :USER_UC, :PRODUCT_UC, :PRODUCT_COUNT)

SELECT S.UNIQUE_CODE AS UNIQUE_CODE$K$H, P.UNIQUE_CODE AS UNIQUE_CODE$H, P.NAME 名称$L, P.PRICE 单价, CONVERT(S.PRODUCT_COUNT, INT) 数量, TRUNCATE(P.PRICE * S.PRODUCT_COUNT,2) 小计 FROM ES_SHOPPING_CART S, ES_PRODUCT P WHERE S.PRODUCT_UC = P.UNIQUE_CODE AND S.USER_UC = :USER_UC
SELECT U.UNIQUE_CODE FROM SYS_USER U, SYS_USERINFO_WX W WHERE U.UNIQUE_CODE = W.UNIQUE_CODE AND W.OPENID = :OPENID
SELECT p.*, f.PATH THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM ES_PRODUCT p left join SYS_FILE_STORE_MAPPING f on p.THUMBNAIL = f.UNIQUE_CODE
SELECT t.NICKNAME 昵称,decode(t.SEX,'1','男','2','女','未知') 性别,t.COUNTRY||t.PROVINCE||t.CITY 位置 FROM SYS_USERINFO_WX t WHERE UNIQUE_CODE = :UNIQUE_CODE
